products.title: Splash Tropez Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tropez is an elegant grey/brown hue, with its rich earthy tones it will compliment a vast range of interior colour palettes. The fabric also has beautiful light filtering properties. Electric blinds are perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any home. When purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Rock Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash rock electric roller blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any home. The fabric is also moisture resistant making it the perfect choice for bathrooms and kitchens. When purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Duck Egg Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash duck egg electric roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it will update most spaces, perfect for introducing colour when paired with natural and wooden tones. Electric blinds work well for hard to reach windows and help add a really modern feel to any home, particularly when paired with their smart hub (sold seperately). The fabric is also moisture resistant making it the perfect choice for bathrooms and kitchens.

products.title: Splash Mid Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash mid grey electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The mid grey is a beautiful, cool grey colour which will work well with most colour palettes within the home or office. Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space. At swift direct blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of their free 5 year guarantee, which mean you know you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Voile Fr Moondust Grey Electric Roller Blind
products.description: Their flame retardant voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark grey electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their voile moondust grey electric roller fabric is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. At swift direct blinds, their modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with their high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with their free 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in their blinds.
